name: Run&Gun (MUDCUP)
description:
What you're going to do
  • You run around the level
  • You shoot things in the level
  • You finish the level
  • You restart the level
  • You improve your highscore... hopefully...

[REPEAT]

Controls :

WASD - Move around 

V - Dash

C - Crouch

R - Reload your pew pew

Mouse 1 - Fire your pew pew
